message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.

Alice, thanks for the offer. It's a great starting point, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my budget. I'm prepared to offer $800,000 for the product,  reflecting its value and my current financial constraints. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a new price of $850,000. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
